[b]Description:[/b]
DeskSoft EarthView 5.7.2 + Карты   
With this program, you can easily create dynamic wallpapers for your desktop or choose a screensaver you like, both of which will be displayed in the video map of our planet, you can put another globe, which will rotate, and do it synchronously with the Earth's rotation if Among you there are interested, then I propose to immediately download EarthView from our project. Note that the program is able to change day and night, the clouds will also change in accordance with the current weather conditions over this or that part of the earth, you can see the lights of cities.
EarthView has two modes of operation, I already wrote about it above. If you decide to create a splash screen, you can view highly detailed views of the earth, globe or map, it all depends on the settings you set. If you believe the developers, the resulting images will be of excellent quality, high resolution, the colors will be saturated, that's what sets the development apart from others, which by the way is not so much, I can not even remember if I met analogues or not. All the parameters that are responsible for the generation of the picture can be set by you in detail, although everything is in English, but I think a little effort and you will be able to fully understand all the available chips, because it's important to adjust the image quality to a specific computer. If you do not have enough pictures offered in the EarthView standard, then you can download additional maps from the official site, I also think you can figure it out yourself.
